overview: A triple dose of psycho-themed horror from three master directors. In Wes Craven's Chiller, a rich woman's son (Michael Beck) thaws out from the deep freeze and goes on a killing spree. In Ken Russell's Gothic, fact and fiction blend when Mary Shelley (Natasha Richardson), Percy Shelley (Julian Sands) and Lord Byron (Gabriel Byrne) get together. Dwain Esper's Maniac finds a gorilla impersonator munching a cat's eye â€¦ among other things.
title: Psychotic Connections
